item.description: The world has had 'Zootopia 2' fever for months, and now it's broken the biggest milestone for animated movies.

item.title: Threads edges out X in daily mobile users, new data shows
item.description: Threads’ daily mobile usage has quietly surpassed X as Meta leans on cross-promotion, creator tools and fast feature rollouts — even as X faces fresh controversies

item.title: What is the release date for Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 4 on Hulu and Disney+?
item.description: Last week's Hulu premiere surprised us with the first three episodes, but when will Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 4 be released?

item.title: Motorola Edge 70 vs iPhone Air : quel smartphone ultrafin choisir ?
item.description: Les smartphones ultrafins seront-ils l'une des grosses tendances de 2026 ? En tout cas, le choix n'est pas encore débordant, et seules quelques références se présentent pour le moment à nous. Comment choisir entre le Moto Edge 70 et l'iPhone Air ?

item.title: New users can get a year of one of our favorite budgeting apps for only $50
item.description: A new year is the perfect time to get your spending in order, and if you're not trying to build your own spreadsheet, budgeting apps are one of the best ways to do it. To save yourself some money in the process, you can pick up a year-long subscription to Monarch Money, one of Engadget's favorite budgeting apps, for just $50 if you use code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout and you're a new subscriber. That's a 50 percent discount on the service's normal $100 price. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, a...

item.title: Microsoft’s first Windows 11 update of 2026 stopped some computers from shutting down
item.description: Microsoft released its first security update of 2026 for Windows 11 on January 13th. Just four days later, it was forced to release an emergency out-of-band update to fix some pretty serious bugs, the first one introduced. The security patch was stopping some systems from shutting down or hibernating properly, and also preventing some users […]

item.title: Voici un aspirateur français qui veut ringardiser Dyson sur un point précis : on a pu l’approcher
item.description: Et si vous n'aviez plus jamais besoin de racheter un aspirateur ? C'est le pari de Deglace, une startup tricolore qui a profité du CES 2026 pour mettre en avant son premier modèle : le Fraction. Entre sa conception 100 % modulaire et ses matériaux aéronautiques, cet appareil ne se veut pas seulement durable : il est pensé pour être pérenne et réparable à vie, loin de l'obsolescence programmée qui ronge le secteur. ...

item.title: Apple's latest 25W MagSafe charger is on sale for $30
item.description:
If you want a wireless charger for your iPhone and prefer to stick with Apple, Amazon has a sale that may pique your interest. The retailer is selling the one meter Apple Magsafe charger for $30, saving you $10 off the regular price, while also selling the two meter model for $40 ($10 off).
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone to get the fastest MagSafe charging speeds, the charger can wirelessly top up the battery of any iPhone from...

item.title: Ce chargeur Ugreen de 65 W avec 5 ports (USB-C et USB-A) compatible avec tous les appareils décharge 25 % de son prix lors des soldes
item.description: Le chargeur Ugreen Zapix 65W est un chargeur polyvalent avec cinq ports au total. Quatre USB-C partagés et un port USB-A. De quoi alimenter une large palette d'appareils, du MacBook aux smartphones Android et iOS. Pour les soldes, son prix passe de 36,99 euros à 27,74 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Disney+ and Hulu deal: Get one month of the bundle for only $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: How YC-backed Bucket Robotics survived its first CES
item.description: Now, the startup is turning its attention to building the business, fundraising and striking commercial deals.

item.title: Ready to ditch Windows for Linux in 2026? Tuxedo's new ultraslim business workstations could be just the ticket, and weigh less than a small cat
item.description: Tuxedo’s InfinityBook Max 16 is a compact Linux mini workstation offering Intel Core Ultra 9, RTX graphics, OLED display, and extensive connectivity.

item.description: Love it or hate it, the 'SNL' version of the 'Stranger Things' secret ending probably isn't far off from what it'd actually be like.

item.title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
item.description: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.

item.description: Amazon has launched a huge Super Bowl TV sale, and I'm rounding up 11 deals that I'd recommend buying, including record-low prices from Samsung, LG, Sony, and more.
